title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down and is no longer on the same line as the label.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label, regardless of the view's size. It should be located to the far right corner.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the view. 2. Resize the view to a smaller size. 3. Observe that the close button moves down from its original position.
